subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Re: Question for all "Frank's ghostbox" owners
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
I'd be very interested, as I seem to be the only one that has this alternate 
ID with some on the other side.

Frank-s


>From: "psi_research" <vilhellm@...>
>Reply-To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
>To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
>Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: Question for all "Frank's ghostbox" owners
>Date: Mon, 09 Jul 2007 04:01:43 -0000
>
>Hi Misty, thank you for your post. I will upload some files. There
>have been interesting sessions with how the Boxes address people by
>name. And now that it's happening to Steve it seems like this is part
>of the phenomena of the Box that is repeatable and observed by
>others. -Bill
>
>--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Misty Dawn <bulletbabea@...> wrote:
> >
> > Bill said something that had me thinking. He mentioned that when he
>first got his box it called Franks name repeatedly. That isnt the
>first time I saw someone say that. I know quite a few of you now have
>been given a box or even constructed your own versions like Steve
>based on the work Frank did.
> >
> >   I have heard a couple of peoples results here but I would like to
>hear more so I am going to ask if you have one you comment on your
>use of it and how you think the results went as well as maybe post a
>few sound files that I can hear. I have spent years listening to the
>box voices but its refreshing to hear others results and see the
>variations as with any other evp method, it differs by user/location.
>LOL you know who you are and I wont name you all but I do hope you
>will share with us.
> >
> >   Thanks!
> >   Misty
> >
> >
> > ---------------------------------
> > Be a better Heartthrob. Get better relationship answers from
>someone who knows.
